flawed_nl_solution:
Jerome has 20 classmates on the list, and has half as many out of school friends on there so he has 20/2=<<20/2=10.0>>10.0 out of school friends on the contact list
He has 2 parents and 1 sister on the contact list, for 2+1= <<2+1=4>>4 family members on the contact list.
Adding the classmates, out of school friends and family members together we get 20+10.0+4=<<20+10.0+4=34.0>>34.0 people on his contact list

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
